ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 104
ygData.msgSnippet: After Talking to a few dark elf sks we decided that giving us a good 1hand sword quest weapon and raising the cap a little on bash would be best for the human
ygData.messageBody:
After Talking to a few dark elf sks we decided that
giving us a good 1hand sword quest weapon and raising
the cap a little on bash would be best for the human
and dark elf sks. We decided maybe a 1hander around
12dmg 36dly and an effect of poison bolt or a weak
lifetap i dunno thats up to you. its basically
supposed to be like a ghoulbane. You could even make
it human and de only if you like. This would help us
because now we can carry a shield and have a decent
1hander instead of always having to carry a 2hander
and lose the ability to bash which the large races do
not....let me know what you think

Tekman HateBringer
Almost level 29 sk
Rodcet Nife Server
